trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for the <c>ThisAddIn</c> class in Outlook add-ins that you create by using Visual Studio.
The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.OutlookAddInBase> class provides functionality for Outlook add-ins that you create by using the Office Development tools in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.OutlookAddInBase>类提供用于 Outlook 的外接程序通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.OutlookAddInBase> class extends <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase> class by providing methods that you can use to access form regions in the project.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.OutlookAddInBase>类扩展<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase>类通过提供可用于访问项目中的窗体区域的方法。
有关详细信息，请参阅[VSTO 外接程序编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.OutlookAddIn" /> object that this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.OutlookAddInBase" /> object extends.
The object that this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.OutlookAddInBase" /> object extends.
Occurs when the add-in loads, and when a form region name that is specified in the registry does not match the name of any form regions defined in the add-in.
You can use this event to supply one or more form regions when the add-in loads.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此事件以便在外接程序加载时提供一个或多个窗体区域。

trans-unit.source: You must describe a form region in the registry.
trans-unit.target: 在注册表中的窗体区域，你必须将其描述。

trans-unit.source: For more information about form region registry entries, see [Registry Entries for VSTO Add-ins](/visualstudio/vsto/registry-entries-for-vsto-add-ins.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关窗体区域注册表项的详细信息，请参阅[VSTO 外接程序的注册表项](/visualstudio/vsto/registry-entries-for-vsto-add-ins.md)。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the name that you specify in the registry must not match the name of any form regions defined in the add-in.
trans-unit.target: 确保在注册表中指定的名称必须在外接程序中定义任何窗体区域的名称不匹配。

trans-unit.source: In the event handler method, set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionFactoryResolveEventArgs.FormRegionFactory%2A> to an instance of any class that implements the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegionFactory> interface.
trans-unit.target: 在事件处理程序方法集中<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionFactoryResolveEventArgs.FormRegionFactory%2A>到任何实现类的实例<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegionFactory>接口。
